channel.title: Vote Point Shop & Getting NPC's To Trade
channel.description:
Ok so i want to make a vote point shop for when you vote, you get points and you can buy stuff from it
But, how do i get items to be purchasable only by vote points?
Also, how do i get an npc to trade so i can put items in the shop?
*InsidiaX Source*
